body_html: Also, when you make new changes, please add them as new commits at the end instead of squashing. It makes repeating the review much easier, because I explicitly see what changed. You can always clean up the history right before merge.
body_text: Also, when you make new changes, please add them as new commits at the end instead of squashing. It makes repeating the review much easier, because I explicitly see what changed. You can always clean up the history right before merge.
body: Also, when you make new changes, please add them as new commits at the end instead of squashing. It makes repeating the review much easier, because I explicitly see what changed. You can always clean up the history right before merge.
